info.name: Out-Of-Band Activity
info.description: The Out-Of-Band Activity app modifies the original app activity version 1.1.23, provided for ownCloud, to use its own external ("out-of-band") database for activity data. The Out-Of-Band Activity app was only tested for ownCloud 7.0.4 and PostgreSQL 9.3.6.
info.author: Iuri Malinoski
